PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FlowMeterTypeEnergyMeter
PropertySetDef.Definition: Device that measures, indicates and sometimes records, the energy usage in a system.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalCurrent
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal current that is designed to be measured.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumCurrent
PropertyDef.Definition: The maximum allowed current that a device is certified to handle.

PropertyDef.Name: MultipleTarriff
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether meter has built-in support for multiple tarriffs (variable energy cost rates).
